thread.title: Chico's FAS, Inc. Announces First Quarter Sales and Earnings Conference Call

author: cnbc.com
title: Chico's FAS, Inc. Announces First Quarter Sales and Earnings Conference Call
text:
FORT MYERS, Fla., May 14, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Women's specialty retailer Chico's FAS, Inc. (NYSE: CHS) will host a conference call with security analysts on Wednesday, May 30, 2018 beginning at 8:30 a.m. EDT to review the operating results for the first quarter ended May 5, 2018.
The conference call is being webcast live over the Internet, which you may access in the Investors section of the Chico's FAS, Inc. corporate website, www.chicosfas.com .
The phone number for the call is 1-877-883-0383. International callers should use 1-412-902-6506. The Elite Entry number, 9120639, is required to join the conference call. Interested participants should call 10-15 minutes prior to the 8:30 a.m. start in order to be placed in queue.
ABOUT CHICO'S FAS, INC.
The Company, through its brands - Chico's, White House Black Market and Soma, is a leading omni-channel specialty retailer of women's private branded, sophisticated, casual-to-dressy clothing, intimates and complementary accessories.
As of February 3, 2018, the Company operated 1,460 stores in the US and Canada and sold merchandise through 94 franchise locations in Mexico. The Company's merchandise is also available at www.chicos.com , www.chicosofftherack.com , www.whbm.com and www.soma.com . For more detailed information on Chico's FAS, Inc., please go to our corporate website at www.chicosfas.com . The information on our corporate website is not, and shall not be deemed to be, a part of this press release or incorporated into our federal securities law filings.
